model

Class PlayableCharacter

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • model.AbstractCharacter
        • model.PlayableCharacter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class PlayableCharacter
extends AbstractCharacter
    Class used to define the playable character. TYPE is the "id" of the class and it's used to manage collisions. When an enemy and a player collide, the addition of their type should be 0. If this is a candy, for a collision with a Candy, it can be any positive integer.

      • collision

        public boolean collision(Vertex v)
        Retrieves a boolean corresponding if the player is colliding with another object.
        Parameters:
        v - The position of the other object.
        Returns:
        Retrieves true if the player collides with the object, otherwise retrieves false.
